content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love archery, spending time with my family and friends, and going to the lake.
That's awesome! I enjoy working on cars, listening to classic radio programs on my iphone, and playing tabletop games.
Tabletop games are fun! What's your favorite?
I've been playing Dungeons & Dragons for years, but I've also been getting into some new games lately like Gloomhaven and Descent.
I've never played D&D, but I've heard good things about it. I'll have to check it out sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun, and there's a huge community of people who play it.
I'm sure I would enjoy it. I'm a big fan of fantasy and role-playing games.
Me too! That's what got me into D&D in the first place.
Well, it sounds like we have a lot in common. I'm glad we met.
Me too! I hope we can get together and play some D&D sometime.
That would be great! I'll bring the snacks.
